page.title: 11Santa Pod
page.content: The drag-racing track, Santa Pod, which is situated on part of the old airfield, is the main activity that exists in this area. Santa Pod is well known in drag-racing circles. Apart from the regular drag-racing competitions, which start with general practise and qualifying rounds, there are many special events such as dare devil stunts through flame and fire. Santa Pod is the only place in the country to hold scheduled night-time racing. The end of the drag-racing season at the Santa Pod Raceway is celebrated with a Firework Spectacular Show. This is held on the first Saturday in November. The day starts at 10.30 with the qualifiers, then at 17.30 they hold the special match sessions. The final race is the Jet Cars race for the Fawkes Trophy. The evening is finishes with fireworks.
